title: Structural Designer
job_overview:
About Us:
We’re a UK-based design and manufacturing firm delivering high-quality, functional, and visually compelling design solutions.

Role:
We’re seeking an experienced Structural Designer for architectural and structural projects.

Key Skills:

2D CAD design (AutoCAD or similar)
Layout drawings & floor plans
Post structures, beams, wall extensions
Frame & structural design
Architectural drawing packages
Knowledge of UK building regulations

Apply:
Send your CV, portfolio, and availability
